entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:46 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
